inclusion.criterion: Duration of the participants involvement in the investigation: Single Visit
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Fractional Exhaled Nitric Oxide (FeNO) Measurements will be performed using the NIOX MINO® device according to "Instructions for NO measurements" which will be provided to each Investigative site prior to patient enrollment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The Investigator is responsible for the detection, reporting, and documentation of events meeting the definition of an Adverse Event (AE) and/or Serious Injuries as provided in this clinical investigation plan from the time of informed consent/assent and during the study period.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The relationship(s) between FeNO and both the diagnosis of asthma and prescription of ICS will be explored by correlation, measures of concordance and logistic modeling.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Diagnosis: No previous or current diagnosis of asthma or chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD).
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Medications: No use of inhaled or oral corticosteroids within 7 days prior to the visit.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has a history of asthma and is currently using ICS. However, he does not meet the exclusion criteria for medications.
